Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 4 minutes ago, Wildcat111 said:
> 
> 
> You live in Sweden?
> 

Yup. I have to bike to school every morning in the rain nowadays ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(") 

Also, we get the support of SpaceX, Blue Origin and ULA (Imagine that... SpaceX and ULA working together... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")) to conquer the solar system. We are unstoppable!!!

I give you a very weird object. You start wondering what the actual hell it is, then you start fighting over it, breaking your alliance. 

Now I make myself a hill and call myself king.

My hill.

We re-form our alliance, regaining control of all our hills and mountains on Earth and Mars. [@ZentroCatson](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/143939-zentrocatson/) can keep his hill.

> 
> 
> 5 hours ago, TheEpicSquared said:
> 
> 
> We re-form our alliance, regaining control of all our hills and mountains on Earth and Mars. [@ZentroCatson](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/143939-zentrocatson/) can keep his hill.
> 

We also claim my old Toblerone Hill on an asteroid.

Our empire with well-fed bureaucrats and soldiers!

The chocolate went rancid, causing a rebellion in the ranks. You are dethroned. The rebellion's leader reveals himself to be...  
***ME.***

*MY HILL NOW.*

I walk on to your hill, take my shades off, demand to know "who's in charge here?"

You're all like "I am!"

I put my shades back on and say coolly, "Not any more you're not."

My hill.

![man-with-no-name-2_758_426_81_s_c1.jpg](https://s3.drafthouse.com/images/made/man-with-no-name-2_758_426_81_s_c1.jpg)  

our hill again

Swarm of Marksmans killed both of you

My hill

![maxresdefault.jpg](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4R7pZOAWQrk/maxresdefault.jpg)

We also claim the Alps.

Our mountain empire!

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-12T06:22:35Z" title="10/12/2016 06:22  AM" data-short="7 yr">October 12, 2016</time> by TheEpicSquared**

Rogal Dorn and his forces level your mountains, build an impenetrable Imperial Fortress upon it, and hand me the keys.

My hill.

![f28f8bdd4e8a4dedf992186c5e3b1bb8.jpg](https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/f2/8f/8b/f28f8bdd4e8a4dedf992186c5e3b1bb8.jpg)

10:59 You climb up the fotress to the top

11:00 I call McCree

11:59 McCree comes along

12:00 *Its high noon!*

You and your forces get shot by a pistol and me, [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/), [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) push you and your forces off the fortress. The we cover you and your forces with dirt. Also we claim your fortress and build many more fortresses along the Alps.

OUR EMPIRE, HILLS AND MOUNTAINS!!!!!!! MWAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-14T21:05:45Z" title="10/14/2016 09:05  PM" data-short="7 yr">October 14, 2016</time> by Wildcat111**

i use a Xheel

A xXxHeelXxX thoose are annoyin i this a grrrrrr gggr eee (gniark gniark gniark)

enuff is enuff. No one is ever going up all our hills.

![Cap_nascimento.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/pt/6/6a/Cap_nascimento.jpg)

[![flamethrower.jpg](https://s1.postimg.io/7ge8xeulr/flamethrower.jpg)](https://s1.postimg.io/7ge8xeulr/flamethrower.jpg "Enlarge image")  

![hqdefault.jpg](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/8CIhhfhMCjI/hqdefault.jpg)

![hqdefault.jpg](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Xh5oSof2AUc/hqdefault.jpg)  
  
![0,,36867123-EX,00.jpg](http://g1.globo.com/Noticias/Rio/foto/0,,36867123-EX,00.jpg)  

it shall be [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/), [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) and mine!!

our hu3ill

Ghost Recon And Task Force 141 made a joint operation

OUR HİLL

(Please no Makarov comments be creative !!!)

I hitch a ride on the first ITS to mars, and build a nice little hab atop Olympus Mons.

My... Hill??

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, RocketSquid said:
> 
> 
> I hitch a ride on the first ITS to mars, and build a nice little hab atop Olympus Mons.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> My... Hill??
> 

New generation HAWX Squadron cleared the area my hill

I go find another hill. There are lots of hills.

My other hill.

Not anymore, because me, [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/) and [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) sue you for building a Hab on our hill (Olympus Mons).

More bills for you to pay, laughs for us.

Our hill.

So what would be the price for leasing Olympus Mons?

In case it's too high, I transdimensional gate in a minor planet and build a bunker on it. I shield and cloak the planetoid and build a [@Parkaboy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/64208-parkaboy/) style negative gravioli spatial destabilization gun on it (capable of ripping open a planet)

My planetoid.

I rent Starkiller base and destroy the entire thing and then build a base on whatever rock is left floating endlessly into space.

My relatively small lump of space rock.

Ah, but you forgot to keep claim of Starkiller Base, you see! I tractor the relatively small lump of rock into an orbit within forcefield range of the planet and raise shields and cloaks around Starkiller. I start fortifying that.

My Starkiller Base.

[@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/)'s tiny asteroidal moon.

> 
> 
> 47 minutes ago, greenTurtle1134 said:
> 
> 
> Ah, but you forgot to keep claim of Starkiller Base, you see! I tractor the relatively small lump of rock into an orbit within forcefield range of the planet and raise shields and cloaks around Starkiller. I start fortifying that.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> My Starkiller Base.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> [@The Raging Sandwich](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/164377-the-raging-sandwich/)'s tiny asteroidal moon.
> 

Drat... Foiled again!

I summon the kraken and destroy [@greenTurtle1134](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/167701-greenturtle1134/)'s Starkiller base and build an even bigger starkiller base.

My Starkiller base. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

I send Han Solo, Chewbacca and a random stormtrooper traitor to destroy starkiller  

I also send with them an hologram of Vader saying how much shame his crybaby Vader-wannabe grandson brings to the dark side for them to deliver to said brat for the hu3hu3

My tiny asteroid moon and the base inside of it survives. I send my troops to capture Solo, Chewie, the traitor, and the hologram.

My rebels!
